lessons.title: The Alphabet
lessons.grammar_notes: Cyrillic basics, special letters (Ѓ/Ќ/Љ/Њ/Џ/Ѕ), and core letter-to-sound patterns.

lessons.title: Greetings
lessons.grammar_notes: Formal vs informal greetings; introduce yourself with 'Се викам' and 'Јас сум'.

lessons.title: Verb "To Be" (сум)
lessons.grammar_notes: Present tense of 'сум' across all persons, with pronouns often omitted in speech for brevity.

lessons.title: Gender Nouns
lessons.grammar_notes: Identify noun gender by endings and align adjectives/pronouns accordingly.

lessons.title: Numbers 1-100
lessons.grammar_notes: Numbers 1–100, -наесет forms, tens, and gender agreement for 'еден/една/едно'.

lessons.title: Shopping
vocabulary_list: Колку чини? — How much does it cost?
lessons.grammar_notes: Price questions, quantities, polite requests, and payment vocabulary.

lessons.title: Directions
lessons.grammar_notes: Left/right/straight plus key location phrases for navigation.

lessons.title: Past Aorist Tense
lessons.grammar_notes: Aorist forms for completed past actions with a full person set and common endings (-в/-ов, -е/-а).

lessons.title: Possessives (мой, твой)
lessons.grammar_notes: Full possessive paradigm with gender/number agreement plus plural/definite forms.

lessons.title: Food & Drink
lessons.grammar_notes: Ordering food/drinks, asking for the bill, and common menu phrases.

lessons.title: Future Tense (ќе)
vocabulary_list: јас ќе одам — I will go
ти ќе одиш — you will go
тој/таа/тоа ќе оди — he/she/it will go
ние ќе одиме — we will go
вие ќе одите — you will go (plural/formal)
тие ќе одат — they will go
нема да одам — I will not go
lessons.grammar_notes: Future tense with 'ќе' across all persons and negative 'нема да', plus time markers.

lessons.title: Modals (може/мора)
lessons.grammar_notes: може/мора with full conjugations for permission, ability, and obligation; 'не мора' for no obligation.

lessons.title: Imperfective vs Perfective Aspect
lessons.grammar_notes: Imperfective vs perfective verb pairs and usage in context.

lessons.title: Complex Sentences
lessons.grammar_notes: Clause linking with ако, бидејќи, затоа што, дека, иако, кога.
